metadata.title: Forever PTO - Optimize your time off
metadata.description: Application to optimize PTO day selection and maximize your free time
metadata.keywords: pto, pto calendar, pto tracker, pto planner, pto management

ptoDays.tooltip: This switch allows you to enable or disable the suggestion of past holidays. This lets you see PTO opportunities that were missed in the past

carryOverMonths.tooltip: Allows adding months to the following year to expand the search for opportunities
